THREE MILE ISLAND, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
Total power output (operational reactors and reactors under construction): 786 MW
Details of reactor unit: THREE MILE ISLAND-1
Reactor type: Pressurised Water Reactor
Current status: Operational
Power rating:  786 MW
Constructed in 1968
Connected to the electricity grid on: 1974-06-19
 
Source of reactor data:  IAEA Power Reactor Information System (PRIS)

THREE MILE ISLAND, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
Total power output (operational reactors and reactors under construction): 880 MW
Details of reactor unit: THREE MILE ISLAND-2
Reactor type: Pressurised Water Reactor
Current status: Decommissioned
Constructed: 01 Nov, 1969
Connected to the electricity grid on: 21 Apr, 1978
Permanent Shutdown Date: 28 Mar, 1979

NOTE: Partial melt-down and radioactive release occurred on March 28, 1979 as a result of a loss of coolant systems.
 
Source of reactor data:  IAEA Power Reactor Information System (PRIS)
